required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of Multidimensional Assessment of THYmic States (MATHYS): A Study in a Population of Bipolar Patients Treated With Olanzapine
clinical_study.official_title: Phase IIIb, Multicenter, Single-Arm Open-Label Study, Supporting the Development and the Validation of the MATHYS Scale (Multidimensional Assessment of THYmic States) in a Population of Bipolar Patients Treated With Olanzapine, Either in-Label (Manic and Mixed Patients) and Off-Label (Hypomanic and Bipolar Depression)

brief_summary.textblock: A non randomized study to validate the MATHYS Scale in a population of in and outpatients greater than or equal to 18 years of age, suffering from Bipolar Disorder I or II, and treated with olanzapine.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean Changes From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Multidimensional Assessment of THYmic States Scale (MATHYS) Total Score
Baseline MATHYS Assessment - Principal Component Analysis and Orthogonal Transformation Matrix

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Hamilton 17-Items Depression Scale (HAMD-17) Total Score
Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Hamilton Anxiety Scale (HAMA) Total Score
Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Young Mania Rating Scale (YMRS) Total Score
Mean Change From Baseline to 24 Week Endpoint in Glycaemia Levels (Glucose Fasting Levels)
Increases and Decreases in Fasting Glucose Levels
Mean Change From Baseline to 24 Week Endpoint in Lipids
Increases and Decreases in Lipid Levels
Mean Change From Baseline to 24 Week Endpoint in Weight
Wellness Interventional Program for Weight Gain Management in Patients (for Those Who Gain at Anytime More Than 7% of Body Weight, Compared to Baseline)
MATHYS Total Score at Baseline - According to Thymic Reactivity Assessment
Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in HAMA Total Scores - According to Thymic Reactivity Assessment
Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in HAMD-17 Total Scores - According to Thymic Reactivity Assessment
Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in YMRS Total Scores - According to Thymic Reactivity Assessment
Emotional Reactivity With the Physiological Measure of Heart Rate
Emotional Reactivity With the Physiological Measure of Skin Conductance
Emotional Reactivity With the Physiological Measure of Startle Reflex Response - Latency of Blink
Emotional Reactivity With the Physiological Measure of Startle Reflex Response - Amplitude of Blink

intervention.description: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients must meet Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders, Fourth Edition, Text Revision (DSM-IV-TR) disease diagnostic criteria for Bipolar Disorder
- currently or most recently in a Manic Episode (Single Manic Episode or Most Recent Episode Manic) or
- currently or most recently in a Hypomanic Episode or
- currently or most recently in a Mixed Episode or
- currently or most recently in a Major Depressive Episode
- and confirmed by the module D of the SCID (Semi-Structured Interview).
2. Patients must be more than 18 of age at Visit 0.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. A valid current or lifetime DSM-IV-TR Axis I or II diagnosis which could interfere, at the investigator's opinion, with the evaluation.
2. Patients on antidepressant or mood stabilizer therapy one week (four weeks with fluoxetine) prior to Visit 1, with the exception of mood stabilizer therapy considered in the opinion of the investigator as an efficient treatment for at least one year prior to the study.

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: All participants received olanzapine and were grouped according to their most recent type of episode.

group.title: Manic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

group.title: Hypomanic Episode

group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 5 mg).

measure.description: Body mass index is an estimate of body fat based on body weight divided by height squared.

outcome.title: Mean Changes From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Multidimensional Assessment of THYmic States Scale (MATHYS) Total Score
outcome.description: A visual analogic scale consisting of 20 items. Item scores vary from 0 (inhibition of the state evaluated by the item) to 10 (excitation for the evaluated state), except for items 5 to 10 and 17 and 18 which are inversed and are consequently to be reversed before the analysis. Total score is sum of the 20 items and can vary from 0 to 200.
outcome.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

group.title: Manic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

group.title: Hypomanic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 10 mg)

group.title: Mixed Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

group.title: Depressive Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 5 mg).

measure.title: Mean Changes From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Multidimensional Assessment of THYmic States Scale (MATHYS) Total Score
measure.description: A visual analogic scale consisting of 20 items. Item scores vary from 0 (inhibition of the state evaluated by the item) to 10 (excitation for the evaluated state), except for items 5 to 10 and 17 and 18 which are inversed and are consequently to be reversed before the analysis. Total score is sum of the 20 items and can vary from 0 to 200.
measure.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

outcome.title: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Hamilton 17-Items Depression Scale (HAMD-17) Total Score
outcome.description: The 17-item HAMD measures depression severity. Each item was evaluated and scored using either a 5-point scale (e.g. absent, mild, moderate, severe, very severe) or a 3-point scale (e.g. absent, mild, marked). The total score of HAMD-17 may range from 0 (not at all depressed) to 52 (severely depressed).
outcome.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

group.title: Manic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

group.title: Hypomanic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 10 mg)

group.title: Depressive Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 5 mg).

measure.title: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Hamilton 17-Items Depression Scale (HAMD-17) Total Score
measure.description: The 17-item HAMD measures depression severity. Each item was evaluated and scored using either a 5-point scale (e.g. absent, mild, moderate, severe, very severe) or a 3-point scale (e.g. absent, mild, marked). The total score of HAMD-17 may range from 0 (not at all depressed) to 52 (severely depressed).
measure.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

outcome.title: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Hamilton Anxiety Scale (HAMA) Total Score
outcome.description: The 14-item HAMA assesses the severity of anxiety. The investigator talked to the patient about their symptoms over the previous week before the study visit. Each item was scored using a 5-point scale, i.e. 0 = absent to 4 = severe. The total score of HAMA-14 may range from 0 (not present) to 56 (very severe).
outcome.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

group.title: Manic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

group.title: Hypomanic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 10 mg)

group.title: Mixed Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

group.title: Depressive Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 5 mg).

measure.title: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Hamilton Anxiety Scale (HAMA) Total Score
measure.description: The 14-item HAMA assesses the severity of anxiety. The investigator talked to the patient about their symptoms over the previous week before the study visit. Each item was scored using a 5-point scale, i.e. 0 = absent to 4 = severe. The total score of HAMA-14 may range from 0 (not present) to 56 (very severe).
measure.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

outcome.title: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Young Mania Rating Scale (YMRS) Total Score
outcome.description: The YMRS is an 11-item scale that measures the severity of manic episodes. Four items are rated on a scale from 0 (symptom not present) to 8 (symptom extremely severe). The remaining items are rated on a scale from 0 (symptom not present) to 4 (symptom extremely severe). The YMRS total score ranges from 0 to 60.
outcome.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

group.title: Manic Episode
group.description: olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks (initial dose = 15 mg).

measure.title: Mean Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in the Young Mania Rating Scale (YMRS) Total Score
measure.description: The YMRS is an 11-item scale that measures the severity of manic episodes. Four items are rated on a scale from 0 (symptom not present) to 8 (symptom extremely severe). The remaining items are rated on a scale from 0 (symptom not present) to 4 (symptom extremely severe). The YMRS total score ranges from 0 to 60.
measure.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

measure.title: Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in HAMD-17 Total Scores - According to Thymic Reactivity Assessment
measure.description: The 17-item HAMD measures depression severity. Each item was evaluated and scored using either a 5-point scale (e.g. absent, mild, moderate, severe, very severe) or a 3-point scale (e.g. absent, mild, marked). The total score of HAMD-17 may range from 0 (not at all depressed) to 52 (severely depressed).
measure.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

outcome.title: Change From Baseline to 6 Week and 24 Week Endpoints in YMRS Total Scores - According to Thymic Reactivity Assessment
outcome.description: The YMRS is an 11-item scale that measures the severity of manic episodes. Four items are rated on a scale from 0 (symptom not present) to 8 (symptom extremely severe). The remaining items are rated on a scale from 0 (symptom not present) to 4 (symptom extremely severe). The YMRS total score ranges from 0 to 60.
outcome.population: Intention to treat. Number of participants with baseline and at least one non-missing postbaseline value.

outcome.title: Emotional Reactivity With the Physiological Measure of Heart Rate
outcome.description: to assess emotional reactivity with the physiological measure of heart rate, recorded as a function of slides sessions from the International Affective Picture System, in a defined subgroup of patients
outcome.population: Measures were to be collected at only one site. Not enough data to analyze.

outcome.title: Baseline MATHYS Assessment - Principal Component Analysis and Orthogonal Transformation Matrix
outcome.description: This analysis indicates whether the total score is correct and provides enough information, or if subscores need to be calculated. Eigen value, proportion and cumulative are statistical parameters from the Principal Component Analysis, given for each factor.
outcome.population: Matrix based on data from all 141 participants.

measure.title: Baseline MATHYS Assessment - Principal Component Analysis and Orthogonal Transformation Matrix
measure.description: This analysis indicates whether the total score is correct and provides enough information, or if subscores need to be calculated. Eigen value, proportion and cumulative are statistical parameters from the Principal Component Analysis, given for each factor.
measure.population: Matrix based on data from all 141 participants.

group.title: Olanzapine
group.description: Olanzapine: 5 to 20 mg (flexible dose) administered orally as disintegrated tablets, daily for 24 weeks.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

event.sub_title: Red blood cell sedimentation rate increased

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Fewer patients than planned were enrolled in the study. Not all the analyses (Principal Component Analysis, scree plot to define the structure) could be provided due to the specific formatting of the clinicaltrials.gov databank.
